forest.name: Forest
forest.description: Bring your pet here to play and increase mood

hunt.name: Hunting Zone
hunt.description: Bring your pet here to battle and earn gold

magic_cookie.name: Magic Cookie
magic_cookie.description: Restores a small amount of hunger
magic_cookie.flavor: With a hint of lavender fragrance, it's the daily ration of magic apprentices

rainbow_candy.name: Rainbow Candy
rainbow_candy.flavor: Seven colors of candy dance on the tongue, as if tasting the rainbow

magic_cake.name: Magic Cake
magic_cake.description: Restores a large amount of hunger
magic_cake.flavor: Baked with moonlight cream and starlight flour, every bite is sweet magic

stamina_potion.name: Stamina Potion
stamina_potion.description: Boosts stamina, halves hunger consumption on next adventure
stamina_potion.flavor: An alchemist's basic recipe, the red liquid glows softly in the bottle

joy_toy.name: Joy Toy
joy_toy.description: Greatly boosts mood (does not restore hunger)
joy_toy.flavor: A magic toy infused with joy spells, pets can't resist pouncing on it

combat_ration.name: Combat Ration
combat_ration.description: Eat before battle for +30% combat rewards
combat_ration.flavor: Made from courage spices and strength herbs, essential before warriors set out

rainbow_potion.name: Rainbow Potion
rainbow_potion.description: Restores hunger and mood, a comprehensive recovery potion
rainbow_potion.flavor: A perfect fusion of seven magical elements, the liquid constantly changes color

amulet.name: Amulet
amulet.description: Keep all gold on next death (auto-triggered)
amulet.flavor: Ancient protective spells are sealed in this rune, emitting a warm glow

first_aid_kit.name: First Aid Kit
first_aid_kit.description: Auto-recovers 50 health when health drops below 30 in battle
first_aid_kit.flavor: Carefully prepared by elven healers, it emits a healing aroma when opened

revive_potion.name: Revive Potion
revive_potion.flavor: Legend says it's condensed from phoenix tears, containing the power of rebirth

water.name: Water
water.description: Most basic supply, restores a small amount of hunger
water.flavor: Clear spring water from a magical spring, simple but essential

exp_scroll.name: EXP Scroll
exp_scroll.flavor: Records the wisdom of ancient sages, text glows and flows into your mind

lucky_charm.name: Lucky Charm
lucky_charm.description: Reduces death chance from 10% to 5% for 1 day
lucky_charm.flavor: Four-leaf clover essence sealed in crystal, holders feel fate's favor

time_hourglass.name: Time Hourglass
time_hourglass.description: Reset all stat decay for today (full revival effect)
time_hourglass.flavor: Said to contain solidified time fragments, you can hear time rewinding when flipped

cat_fragment.name: Cat Fragment
cat_fragment.description: A magic shard from Slugcat, used to synthesize pets
cat_fragment.flavor: Emits a gentle purple glow, collect enough to summon new companions

bird_fragment.name: Bird Fragment
bird_fragment.description: A feather crystal from Wind Feather, used to synthesize pets
bird_fragment.flavor: Light as air, emanating an aura of freedom

fox_fragment.name: Fox Fragment
fox_fragment.description: Condensed flame sparks from Flame Tail, used to synthesize pets
fox_fragment.flavor: Contains the warmth of fire, yet feels gentle to the touch

dragon_fragment.name: Dragon Fragment
dragon_fragment.description: Tiny crystal from Crystal Dragon scales, used to synthesize pets
dragon_fragment.flavor: The power of ancient dragons slumbers within

backpack.title: Backpack
backpack.hint: ğŸ’¡ Drag items to the crystal ball to feed your pet
backpack.goShop: Go to the shop to buy items!
